issue.title: [C++] run-cmake-format.py is not supported on Windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4548](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4548). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I tried to fix it but no matter what option I pass for `--line-ending` to `cmake-format` it converts LF line endings to CRLF.
